ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Su's Bazaar problems... ;-) (was Re: Dinosaur)
ygData.msgSnippet: This isnt directly related to bazaar lag/framerate issues cause Bazaar is a bit of a special case but if you have problems with lag/framerate issues this might
ygData.messageBody:
This isnt directly related to bazaar lag/framerate issues cause Bazaar is a
bit of a special case but if you have problems with lag/framerate issues
this might be a solution.

Ripped from the safehouse, Vaslin is the admin there usually doesn't seem to
post pure crap.

http://pub146.ezboard.com/fthesafehousethebackroomsecretsspoilers.showMessag
e?topicID=12993.topic


Also a few guildies turn on an off virusprotection in some zones to get rid
of lag issues. Its ok with the protection on, it just needs to be restarted
as you enter certain zones. Quite odd I know, but it works.




-----Original Message-----
From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik [mailto:biltilie@...]
Sent: den 15 mars 2003 15:46
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Su's Bazaar problems... ;-) (was Re: Dinosaur)


Su, i just had another idea about your Bazaar problems:

how much space do you have availible on your harddisk?
is there enough room for your swapfile?

besides, if you enable EQ texture caching, it will also
eat up harddisk space.

one more thing to add: when did you run defrag the last
time?


just an idea...

- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
